arts.ttl: Man City 2-0 Napoli ANALYSIS: Erling Haaland hits Champions League milestone, City star dazzles again... and has Pep Guardiola finally found his winning formula ahead of Arsenal?
arts.sum: NATHAN SALT AT THE ETIHAD STADIUM: Rasmus Hojlund will - rightly - be sick of being in Manchester after a display that will have given him flashbacks to life in the red half of the city.
